title:
Consider the reaction of nitrogen gas with hydrogen gas to form ammonia:

N₂ (g) + $$3$$ H₂ (g) ⇌ $$2$$ NH₃ (g)

Given that at 298K: ∆G° $$=$$ $$-33.30$$ $$ rac{kJ}{mol}$$ for the reaction above, and ∆$$H_f$$° for NH₃ $$=$$ $$-45.90$$ $$ rac{kJ}{mol}$$.
body: Show your work for all the problems and save the document. You will be asked to submit the work for credit. Please complete the entire module in a single sitting.\n For each answer input box, enter only a numeric response without commas, units, or additional formatting.
